General.Name: Fantagio Corp
General.Description: Fantagio Corp. operates as an integrated entertainment company in Korea. It is involved in artist management, record production, and film and drama production, as well as discovers newcomers. Fantagio Corp. was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

2.Name: Mr. Byung-Hak  Go
2.Title: Chief Financial Officer and Sr. Managing Director

3.Name: Mr. Dong-Yun  Han
3.Title: Chief Marketing Officer and Managing Director
